summary: Added comprehensive off-chain node implementation tasks for ICN project: Director Node Core Runtime (T009), Validator Node (T010), Super-Node (T011), Regional Relay Node (T012), and Viewer Client Application (T013). All tasks include detailed acceptance criteria, test scenarios, technical implementation guidance, and integration points with on-chain pallets.

T009.title: Director Node Core Runtime Implementation
T009.rationale: Core orchestration layer for AI video generation with BFT coordination

T010.title: Validator Node Implementation
T010.rationale: Independent CLIP-based verification for content quality and challenge participation

T011.title: Super-Node Implementation (Tier 1 Storage and Relay)
T011.rationale: Regional storage layer with Reed-Solomon erasure coding and audit response

T012.title: Regional Relay Node Implementation (Tier 2 Distribution)
T012.rationale: City-level caching and distribution for low-latency viewer experience

T013.title: Viewer Client Application (Tauri Desktop App)
T013.rationale: End-user interface with WebCodecs playback and optional P2P seeding

critical_path_impact: T009 is on critical path as primary off-chain execution layer. T011, T012, T013 form viewer delivery pipeline.
